page.title: 12Farming, Garden Centres
page.content: In this block is a large enterprise, Wyevale Nurseries Ltd, which now runs 10 Garden Centres in England and Wales. The original nursery dating from 1930 was developed as a garden centre after 1963. Roses, hardy herbaceous plants and fruit trees especially apples are grown here. Other nurseries in the group produce alpines, shrubs and trees. Many specimen trees are grown for amenity and landscape planting. Most plants are sold in containers for instant planting; this trend has encouraged the rapid growth of interest in gardening as a leisure activity. These garden centres sell all kinds of plants, including pot plants for the home, and also a wide range of seeds, bulbs and garden sundries such as tools and fertilisers.
